presentationColumns.name: # of Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Leads Converted
presentationColumns.description: The total Converted Leads (Lead Status = Converted)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Leads Converted

presentationColumns.name: # of Leads Generated from Marketing Source
presentationColumns.description: The total Leads generated from Marketing Source (Lead Source = Marketing)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Leads Generated from Marketing Source

localization.localizationKey: # of Leads Generated from Marketing Source

presentationColumns.name: # of Leads Generated from Non Marketing Source
presentationColumns.description: The total Leads generated from Non- marketing Source (Lead Source not equal to Marketing)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Leads Generated from Non Marketing Source

localization.localizationKey: # of Leads Generated from Non Marketing Source

presentationColumns.name: # of Assigned Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total assigned leads (Assignment status = Assigned)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Assigned Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Sales Accounts with Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Sales Accounts with Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Sales Accounts with Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Contacts with Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Contacts with Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Contacts with Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Accepted Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Accepted Leads (Accepted Flag = Y)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Accepted Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Rejected Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Rejected Leads (Assignment Status = Rejected)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Rejected Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Retired Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Retired Leads (Lead Status = Retired)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Retired Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Unaccepted Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Unaccepted Leads (Accepted Flag = N)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Unaccepted Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Unassigned Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Unassigned Leads. This metric is computed as follows: # of Leads - # of Assigned Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Unassigned Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Unconverted Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Unconverted Leads. This metric is computed as follows: # of Leads - # of Converted Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Unconverted Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Unqualified Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Unqualified leads (Lead Status = Unqualified)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Unqualified Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Leads from Sales Account
presentationColumns.description: The total leads from Sales Account (Sales Account Type = Customer)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Leads from Sales Account

presentationColumns.name: # of Leads from Prospect Sales Account
presentationColumns.description: The total leads from Prospect (Sales Account Type = Prospect)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Leads from Prospect Sales Account

localization.localizationKey: # of Leads from Prospect Sales Account

presentationColumns.name: # of Prospect Leads Converted
presentationColumns.description: The total Converted Leads from Prospect(Lead Status = Converted, Sales Account Type = Prospect)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Prospect Leads Converted

presentationColumns.name: # of Sales Accounts Leads Converted
presentationColumns.description: The total Converted Leads from Sales Account(Lead Status = Converted, Sales Account Type = Customer)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Sales Accounts Leads Converted

presentationColumns.name: # of Qualified Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Qualified Leads (Lead Status = Qualified)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Qualified Leads

presentationColumns.name: # Partner Assigned Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total leads assigned to a Partner
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# Partner Assigned Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Highly Ranked Qualified Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Qualified Hot Leads (Lead Status = Qualified, Rank Name = Hot)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Highly Ranked Qualified Leads

presentationColumns.description: The total Qualified Cool Leads (Lead Status = Qualified, Rank Name = Cool)

presentationColumns.description: The total Qualified Warm Leads (Lead Status = Qualified, Rank Name = Warm)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Medium Ranked Qualified Leads

presentationColumns.name: # of Qualified Expired Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Qualified Expired Leads (Lead Status = Qualified, Current Date > Lead Expiry Date)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.# of Qualified Expired Leads

presentationColumns.name: Lead Qualification Rate (%)
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Qualified Leads to the total Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Qualified Leads/# of Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Lead Qualification Rate (%)

presentationColumns.name: Leads to Opportunity Conversion (%)
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Converted Leads to the total Leads. This metric is computed as follows: # of Converted Leads/# of Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Leads to Opportunity Conversion (%)

presentationColumns.name: Rejected Leads (%)
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Rejected Leads to the total Leads. This metric is computed as follows: # of Rejected Leads/# of Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Rejected Leads (%)

presentationColumns.name: Retired Leads (%)
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Retired Leads to the total Leads. This metric is computed as follows: # of Retired Leads/# of Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Retired Leads (%)

presentationColumns.name: Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Lead Owner Resource Hierarchy)
presentationColumns.description: Lead to Opportunity Conversion % calculated at the total level of lead owner hierarchy
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Lead Owner Resource Hierarchy)

localization.localizationKey: Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Lead Owner Resource Hierarchy)

presentationColumns.name: Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Primary Partner Hierarchy)
presentationColumns.description: Lead to Opportunity Conversion % calculated at the total level of primary partner hierarchy
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Primary Partner Hierarchy)

localization.localizationKey: Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Primary Partner Hierarchy)

presentationColumns.name: Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Sales Account Hierarchy)
presentationColumns.description: Lead to Opportunity Conversion % calculated at the total level of sales account hierarchy
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Sales Account Hierarchy)

localization.localizationKey: Leads Conversion % (Across Levels in Sales Account Hierarchy)

presentationColumns.name: Lead Idle Days
presentationColumns.description: The total days the Active Lead is idle (Lead Status not equal to Retired/Rejected). This metric is computed as follows:  Current Date - Last Activity Date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Lead Idle Days

presentationColumns.name: Average Lead Age (Days)
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the Leads. This metric is computed as follows: For Converted or Retired Leads, the day when it was converted/Retired - Lead Created date. For others it is the Current Date - the Lead created date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Average Lead Age (Days)

presentationColumns.name: Average Number of Days to Convert Leads
presentationColumns.description: The Average number of days to Convert a lead. This metric is computed as follows: Total Lead Age of Converted leads/ # of Converted Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Average Number of Days to Convert Leads

localization.localizationKey: Average Number of Days to Convert Leads

presentationColumns.name: Average Number of Days to Assign Leads
presentationColumns.description: The Average number of days to Assign Leads. This metric is computed as follows: Days to Assign Leads/# of Assigned Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Average Number of Days to Assign Leads

localization.localizationKey: Average Number of Days to Assign Leads

presentationColumns.name: Average Number of Days Open for Unqualified Leads
presentationColumns.description: The Average number of days to Qualify a lead. This metric is computed as follows: Total Lead Age of Unqualified leads/ # of Unqualified Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Average Number of Days Open for Unqualified Leads

localization.localizationKey: Average Number of Days Open for Unqualified Leads

presentationColumns.name: Lead Qualification to Conversion Velocity
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Converting the Qualified Leads. This metric is computed as follows: Lead Converted Date - Lead Qualified Date / # of Converted Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Lead Qualification to Conversion Velocity

presentationColumns.name: Lead Qualification Velocity
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Qualifying the Leads. This metric is computed as follows: Lead Qualified Date - Lead Created Date/# of Qualified Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Lead Qualification Velocity

presentationColumns.name: Potential Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Lead Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Potential Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Market Potential
presentationColumns.description: The total Lead Revenue for Qualified or Unqualified Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Total Market Potential in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Raw Lead Amount
presentationColumns.description: The total Raw Lead Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead.Raw Lead Amount in CX Currency
